question: On Monday, Noah wants to exercise for thrice the amount of time he did on Sunday and Saturday combined. On Saturday he exercised for 11 minutes. On Sunday he exercised for 17 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Monday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Saturday and Sunday he exercised a total of 28 minutes because 11 + 17 = <<11+17=28>>28
On Monday he has to exercise for 84 minutes because 28*3 = <<28*3=84>>84
#### 84
